name: Wishiwashi
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: When it’s in trouble, its eyes moisten and begin to shine. The shining light attracts its comrades, and they stand together against their enemies.

abilities.name: Cowardice
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard all cards attached to this Pokémon and return it to your hand. You can’t use this Ability during your first turn or on the turn this Pokémon was put into play.
